excerpt: A delicious vegan stir-fry recipe with colorful vegetables and flavorful sauce.

ingredients.name: Green Beans
ingredients.notes: Trimmed and cut into bite-sized pieces

instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, ginger, and dissolved cornstarch.
In a large wok or non-stick frying pan, heat some oil over medium-high heat.
Add the cubed tofu and cook until lightly browned.
Remove the tofu from the pan and set aside.
In the same pan, add the broccoli florets and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Add the red bell pepper, carrots, and green beans. Continue to stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes.
Pour in the sauce and stir to coat the vegetables.
Return the tofu to the pan and stir-fry for another minute until everything is heated through and the sauce has thickened.
Serve hot and enjoy your vegan stir-fry!
